pkgmetadata.longdescription: # FRAUGThe GitHub repository of the **FRAUG** (**F**or **R**ealistic **AUG**mentations) 游냦 library! # 游뚾 WIP ## TODO|Methods|Sub-method|Sub-submethod|Interest of the method|Pseudo-code for French|Pseudo-code for multilingual|Rust|Example||:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:||Lexical substitution|Thesaurus|Dictionary of synonyms| |游릭|游댮|游댮|游댮|| | |WordNet| |游릭|游댮|游댮|游댮|| | |Wonef| |游릭|游댮|游댮|游댮|| |Word embedding|Gensim (Fauconnier)| |游릭|游댮|游댮|游댮|| | |FastText| |游릭|游댮|游댮|游댮|| |Masked language model (BERT like)|Random| |游릭|游댮|游댮|游댮|| | |POS| |游댮|游댮|游댮|游댮|| |TD-IDF| | |游댮|游댮|游댮|游댮||Back-translation|Marian (Helsinki-NLP models)| | |游릭|游댮|游댮|游댮|| |M2M100| | |游릭|游댮|游댮|游댮|| |See if other models have appeared since| | |游댮|游댮|游댮|游댮||Transformation of the text surface| | | |Not relevant in French, will have to be done for English|游댮|游댮|游댮||Random noise injection|Spelling mistakes injection| | |游릭|游댮|游댮|游댮|| |Typing errors injection| | |游릭|游댮|游댮|游댮|| |Unigram noise injection| | |游댮|游댮|游댮|游댮|| |Noise injection| | |游댮|游댮|游댮|游댮|| |Mixed sentences| | |游댮|游댮|游댮|游댮|| |Random insertion| | |游릭|游댮|游댮|游댮|| |Random swap| | |游릭|游댮|游댮|游댮|| |Random deletion| | |游릭|游댮|游댮|游댮||Cross-over augmentation| | | |游댮|游댮|游댮|游댮||Manipulating the syntax tree|Time manipulation| | |游맢游댮|游댮|游댮|| |Gender manipulation| | |游맢游댮|游댮|游댮|| |Number manipulation| | |游맢游댮|游댮|游댮||MixUp|Word Mix Up| | |游댮|游댮|游댮|游댮|| |Sentence Mix Up| | |游댮|游댮|游댮|游댮||Generative methods|Generate paraphrases| | |游맢游댮|游댮|游댮|| |Complexification| | |游맢游댮|游댮|游댮||Text simplification|Text summary| | |游릭|游댮|游댮|游댮|| |Simplification| | |游맢游댮|游댮|游댮|---If you find the project useful, please consider giving it a star 救넖잺.
